CONTENT: There's nothing wrong with the Surface 2 if all you do is browse the web  check email  do occasional Office work  and play games everyÔªø once in awhile from the Windows Store. That's all most average consumers do nowadays anyway. If you need to do more hardcore work with it like Photoshop  CAD  etc. then the Pro 2 is the better choice.

TITLE: Part of it is ...
CONTENT: Part of it is actually Microsoft's fault for not easily differentiating RT from Pro for consumers. They just think "Oh it runs Windows so it must run all my old programs." Once they get RT and realizeÔªø it cannot do any of that they get pissed and return it. However I believe it's also partly the consumer's fault for not doing research before purchasing the product.

TITLE: It's called good ...
CONTENT: It's called good marketing.Ôªø No matter how much you love Windows/Microsoft products  there's no denying that Apple is far better at marketing their products. Case and point  Microsoft is in its early stages of copying the Apple Store experience with its new stores.

TITLE: Apple does have ...
CONTENT: Apple does have better marketing than Microsoft I will give you that. They're a lot better at convincing people to get something they don't really need. They know how to make stuff flashy and get people's attention  but Microsoft makes better hardware IMO. I think the iPad is slick looking too  but MS has always had better compatibility with their products. Sadly their marketing team just consists of a bunch of gorillas throwingÔªø shit at each other across the table.

TITLE: It's amusing to ...
CONTENT: It's amusing to read how many negative comments are directed at Apple on many Microsoft/Windows product reviews. You hardly see any of that on reviews of AppleÔªø products  certainly nowhere near the same volume. It makes me laugh :D
